entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 March 2023
